#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    long long int n,temp,pos;
    vector <long long int> v;
    int t,i,j;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++){
        cin>>n;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            cin>>temp;
            v.push_back(temp);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        long long int a[n];
        pos=n-1;
        for(j=1;j<n;j+=2){
            a[j]=v[pos];
            pos--;
        }
        for(j=0;j<n;j+=2){
            a[j]=v[pos];
            pos--;
        }
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            cout<<a[j]<<" ";
        
        }
        cout<<"\n";
        v.clear();
    }


	return 0;
}
